entry.title: $2399 // 2 Bed/2 Bath in Prime Bushwick! 2 Blocks from M Train!
entry.content:
Outstanding 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in prime Bushwick!

Featuring two full bathrooms and big bedrooms on opposite ends of the apartment, allowing for optimal privacy! -- - Large common space with plenty of room to hang out in
- Spacious kitchen has stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher!

Awesome location, only 2 blocks to the Knickerbocker M, short walk to the Myrtle-Broadway JMZ and another short walk to Myrtle-Wyckoff M and L trains! Nearby Archie's, Lucy's, Pizza Party, Alphaville, The Wheelhouse, and SO much more! NO BROKER FEE - Call or text Oliver at show contact info to view!

entry.title: $2150 // Bushwick 2 BR apartment available September 1st
entry.content:
Cross streets are Wilson / Dekalb near the M train(2 blocks), L Train(3 blocks), and J train (10 minute walk).

Both bedrooms are very large and are on opposite sides of the apartment.
3rd floor walk up right across the street from the police precinct.

There are tons of great coffee shops / restaurants / bars / vintage clothing etc. around.

Water is included in rent and I will include 1 AC window unit. All other utilities are your responsibility. Electricity is around 100-150 a month, gas is around 30-50 a month.

No broker fee. Must get filled today!

Security deposit is 1st and last months rent.

$100 application fee.
